name: mlvl_inference
author: Pierre Erbacher, Philippe Delachartre
command-line: myPATH=$PWD; cp [DATA_INF] /mlvl/. ;cd /mlvl ;fbname=$(basename [DATA_INF] .mat); python Inference.py Unet0.h5 /mlvl/${fbname}.mat; cp ${fbname}_infer.nii $myPATH/[RESULTS]

inputs.name: Input data
inputs.description:
use the magnifying glass to select the input data (3D cUS file with extension .mat)
If the data are not available, you have to upload them with file transfer.

output-files.name: Result of Inference
output-files.description: use the default directory home for a test otherwise create your own directory under home.
